channel.title: Cats on Code
channel.description: The cattiest web development blog on the interwebz.

item.title: Graduating my Web Design Students
item.description:
Two weeks ago I taught my first class in front of 13 teenagers who had no idea what they were getting themselves into. Much like them, I had no idea what I was getting myself into by teaching them, but I knew it was the start of someting great.

Learn. Love. Code.

In the matter of two weeks I was meant to turn these kids from knowing nil about programing into making a live, deployed sinatra app for all the interwebz to see.

item.title: Graduating my First Cohort of Students
item.description:
I taught my first class this past June in front of 13 teenagers who had no idea what they were getting themselves into. Much like them, I had no idea what I was getting myself into by teaching them, but I knew it was the start of someting great.

Learn. Love. Code.

In the matter of two weeks I was meant to turn these kids from knowing nil about programing into making a live, deployed sinatra app for all the interwebz to see.

item.title: Welcome
item.description:
The internet is comprised entirely out of cats and code, it was only time before thier forces joined to collaborate. With thier powers combined, a blog

The code behind the Cats
